faucetMnemonic: abandon abandon abandon abandon abandon abandon abandon abandon abandon abandon abandon about

notes.registryUrl: URL to unicity-ids registry JSON (defines token type and all coins)
notes.nostrRelay: WebSocket URL of the Nostr relay for P2P messaging
notes.aggregatorUrl: URL of the Unicity aggregator service
notes.aggregatorApiKey: API key for aggregator/payment gateway. Can be overridden via AGGREGATOR_API_KEY env var
notes.faucetMnemonic: BIP-39 mnemonic phrase for faucet identity. Keep this secure!
notes.defaultAmount: Default token amount if not specified via CLI
notes.defaultCoin: Default coin name (e.g., 'solana', 'bitcoin', 'ethereum') if not specified
